Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DMT1 expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels less than 50% on day 7.
